q2.spacebook

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • q2.spacebook.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a Spacebook User.

      • search

        public Message search(java.lang.String content,
             java.util.ArrayList<Message> msg)
        Searches a list of messages to see if their content matches a specified content. Returns any messages that match the searched for content string exactly.
        Parameters:
        content - the content sought
        msg - the array Message objects to be searched
        Returns:
        returns the first Message containing content, else null

      • search

        public Message search(Subject subject,
             java.util.ArrayList<Message> msg)
        Searches a list of messages to see if their subject matches a specified subject. Returns any messages that match the searched for subject string exactly.
        Parameters:
        subject - seeking a Message object with Subject subject
        msg - the array Message objects to be searched
        Returns:
        returns the first Message with subject matching param, else null
